title: FRANGLAIS IN THE CITY
desc:
We're? tres ?excited to be hosting yet another Franglais event! ?Brush off your french cobwebs, and join us in NYC for drinks, and mingling? en francais! ? 
 FRANCOPHONES: you're welcome too! ?Come practice your english, and make some new friends in the Big? POMME ?:-) 
 Admission is $29, but if you book via eventbrite it is reduced to $25! 
 *Please note that all tickets will be refunded in full should you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the event*
